thread.title: Riber H1 net consolidated loss narrows to 3.5 million euros
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Riber H1 net consolidated loss narrows to 3.5 million euros | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Riber H1 net consolidated loss narrows to 3.5 million euros
text:
Sept 25 Riber SA :
* H1 net consolidated loss 3.5 million euros ($3.9 million) versus loss of 3.6 million euros previous year
* H1 operating loss 3.6 million euros versus loss of 3.6 million euros year ago
* Results in 2015 will be lower than in 2014
* Order book is expected to represent over 10 million euros at end-September Source text for Eikon: ($1 = 0.8955 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom)
